directions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium high heat. Add chicken and onion and saute for 4 to 5 minutes. Stir in broth, chile peppers, garlic powder, cumin, oregano, cilantro and red pepper. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in beans and simmer for 10 minutes; top with green onion and cheese and serve.
ingredients: 6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - chopped
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chile peppers
2 (19 ounce) cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
title: Carol's Chicken Chili
